articles.caption: A look at how Rollic hit 2B downloads

articles.caption: A look at Sony's PlayStation Studios moving hard into mobile
articles.title: Sony‚Äôs new PlayStation Studios Mobile team is making spinoff games for your phone

articles.caption: A look at Netflix working on gamertags
articles.title: Netflix is working on gamertags
articles.description: Netflix is working on a gamertags-like feature that lets users create and publicly display a handle when playing some of its games. Users will also be able to invite other players and see where they rank on the leaderboards.
